name: TerrainTest1.3
description:
Follow and collect the cubes on your way to the top of the mountain, where a surprise eagerly awaits you~

An small open world with plenty to discover.

Standard WASD controls. Esc for menu.

As of April 9, 2019, 'Quit' and 'Resume' buttons not functioning. Will fix in an upcoming patch. 

End music created by me using GarageBand.
